lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Mobile, Ala., blocked the use of more than $58 million of BP oil spill recovery money for construction of a hotel along the Gulf of Mexico.

headline.print_headline: Alabama: Spill Recovery Money Won’t Go To Hotel
headline.main: Alabama: Spill Recovery Money Won’t Go to Hotel

snippet: A federal judge in Mobile, Ala., blocked the use of more than $58 million of BP oil spill recovery money for construction of a hotel along the Gulf of Mexico.
